attributes.title: Disappointed & concerning data collection
attributes.review: I downloaded this app in order to stay up to date with President Trumpâ€™s campaign as we near the 2020 election. While I have always been a MAGA proponent, I must warn others â€” do not download this app on your phone! I have a proprietary blockchain software in the making, which can detect data encryption and VPNs used in malware/spyware; though it is still in its final development stage, itâ€™s far enough along for me to be able to detect that this app spies on you! It collects not only all your personal information, but can also use functions such as your camera, voice audio, credit card info, the list goes on. The worst part is, the VPN in question seems to be out of RUSSIA. What has America come to?! First Mark Zuckerberg and now Trump??? America is the land of the FREE, let us be free so we can MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN!!!

attributes.title: BAD DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: I am extremely disappointed with the results of this app. I was an avid trump supporter and this app made me change my mind. The amount of hate on this app is ASTRONOMICAL. I wanted to download this app so I could stay up to date with trumps decisions, but was disappointed when all it did was spread hateful thoughts, ideas, and actions to its users. This app took forever to download, and after it did, it spammed me with THOUSANDS of messages that were not helpful at all. Also, it played really bad music that made my dog cry.m and I couldnâ€™t figure out how to turn it off till I delete the app. At this point, I realize that this app reflects perfectly on his presidential term; sucky. I loved Trump, but after using this app, my eyes will forever be opened to the kind of person he is. He has lost not only my vote, but my support for him and this stupid app.

attributes.title: This app made my house burn down
attributes.review: It is hard to write this review since I am now living on the streets of downtown New Orleans. But this app burned my house down. BURNED IT I TELL YOU, BURNED IT! All thatâ€™s left is dust and ash. Now let me tell you what happened. I was downloading the app to help support our wonderful amazing delicious handsome scrum-diddly-umptious president. When it started to download, it was taking forever. Took a solid 2 whole Greys Anatomy seasons for it to finally install into my brand new iphone. When i finally installed it, I opened the app and went to put in my phone number and boom. My hand started to burn, hotter than pavement on a 100 degree Arizona day I tell ya. To avoid damage to my hand, I threw my phone onto my bed in a panic. The phone landed on my homework, AND WAS SO HOT IT SET IT ON FIRE. Suddenly my whole bed was in flames, and soon the whole house. This app ruined my life ğŸ˜­
